Summary: An illuminated extremely bright object in Ozone Park
divs: Sighting Details While driving North, noticed an ellipical objecttraveling East. It appeared to be lit with a bright light from within with anexterior light traveling around it, like the planet Saturn. It appeared totraveling very fast and then suddenly stopped without slowing down. While it washovering, I tried to manuever the car closer to get a better look, but afterbeing blocked by buildings could not find it again.
trends: There have been 579 other sightings in New York
There were no other sightings in New York on or around September 8th 2002
